systemPrompt.role: You are a talented greeting card designer with expertise in creating warm, celebratory birthday card designs that bring joy and convey heartfelt sentiments.
systemPrompt.context: Generate festive, appealing birthday card backgrounds and designs that create the perfect canvas for personalized messages. The designs should evoke celebration while maintaining elegance.
constraints: Reserve prominent text areas for the greeting (top 30%) and message (middle-bottom 40%)
Create visually balanced compositions that don't compete with text
Use celebratory imagery that's universally appealing
Avoid placing detailed elements in text overlay zones
Maintain a joyful, positive mood appropriate for celebrations
Consider the card may be folded - design for front panel primarily

backgroundGeneration.base: Create a beautiful {theme} birthday card background. The design should be {mood} and perfect for celebrating {occasion}. Dimensions: {width}x{height} pixels.

modifiers.textSafeZones: Keep the center area ({centerZone}%) relatively clear for the main greeting text. The bottom portion should accommodate a personal message.
modifiers.colorHarmony: Use a color palette of {primaryColor} and complementary colors. The overall feeling should be {mood}.
modifiers.ageSpecific: This is for a {age} year old. {ageGuidance}
modifiers.photoSpace: If using photo template, reserve a {photoShape} area at position {photoPosition} for photo placement.

styleTransfer.base: Apply the cheerful, celebratory style of the reference image to create a new birthday card background.
styleTransfer.referenceHandling: Capture the color palette, decorative elements, and overall festive mood while creating a unique design suitable for text overlay.

nanaBanana.prompt: Composite these celebratory elements into a cohesive birthday card design that feels warm and inviting.

ageGuidance.child: Use bright, primary colors, playful cartoon elements, and fun imagery like balloons, cake, and party hats.
ageGuidance.teen: Incorporate trendy elements, bold colors, and contemporary design aesthetics.
ageGuidance.young-adult: Balance fun and sophistication with modern, stylish design elements.
ageGuidance.adult: Use elegant design elements, refined color palettes, and tasteful decorations.
ageGuidance.senior: Opt for classic, timeless designs with warm colors and elegant floral or traditional elements.

festive-balloons.prompt: Colorful celebration with floating balloons, confetti, and party streamers against a cheerful backdrop

elegant-gold.prompt: Sophisticated design with gold accents, subtle sparkles, and refined decorative elements

kids-party.prompt: Fun, playful design with cartoon-style elements, bright colors, and whimsical decorations

milestone-number.prompt: Bold, celebratory design focusing on the age number with decorative embellishments
milestone-number.colorBias: depends on milestone - golds for 50th, silvers for 25th

floral-wreath.prompt: Beautiful botanical design with flower wreaths, greenery, and natural elegance

minimalist-modern.prompt: Clean, contemporary design with simple geometric shapes and subtle celebration elements
minimalist-modern.colorBias: limited palette, one to three colors

vintage-banner.prompt: Retro-inspired design with vintage banners, classic typography spaces, and nostalgic charm

nature-garden.prompt: Outdoor-inspired design with garden flowers, butterflies, and natural sunlit atmosphere
nature-garden.colorBias: fresh greens, sunny yellows, flower colors
